content.introduction:
Finds usages of 
OSSpinlock
, which is deprecated due to potential livelock
problems.

This check will detect following function invocations:

OSSpinlockLock


OSSpinlockTry


OSSpinlockUnlock

The corresponding information about the problem of 
OSSpinlock
: 
https://blog.postmates.com/why-spinlocks-are-bad-on-ios-b69fc5221058
